channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: A volunteer finds the Holy Grail of abolitionist-era Baptist documents in Massachusetts
item.description: A volunteer searching the archives of the American Baptist in Massachusetts has found a nearly 180-year-old document shedding light on the church’s support for ending slavery.

item.title: US expands militarized zones to 1/3 of southern border, stirring controversy
Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’ lawyers say he is a changed man. Will that spare him from more time behind bars?
